trans-unit.source: The contact's given name.
trans-unit.target: 联系人的姓名;

trans-unit.source: The contact's name. This has the following subproperties:
trans-unit.target: 联系人的姓名。它有以下子属性:

trans-unit.source: The contact's physical location. The value is a geo microformat where none of the properties are required.
trans-unit.target: 联系人的实际位置。该值是不需要任何属性的 geo 微格式。

trans-unit.source: The contact's public key, for exchanging encrypted data with the contact. Plural.
trans-unit.target: 联系人的公共密钥，用于与联系人交换加密的数据。复数。

trans-unit.source: The contact's telephone number. Plural. Each element has the following subproperties:
trans-unit.target: 联系人的电话号码。复数。每个元素具有以下子属性：

trans-unit.source: The contact's time zone.
trans-unit.target: 联系人的时区。

trans-unit.source: The content attribute is the attribute as you set it from the content (the HTML code) and you can set it or get it via element.setAttribute() or element.getAttribute(). The content attribute is always a string even when the expected value should be an integer. For example, to set an <input> element's maxlength to 42 using the content attribute, you have to call setAttribute("maxlength", "42") on that element.
trans-unit.target: content属性是您从内容（HTML代码）中设置的属性，您可以通过 element.setAttribute() 或 element.getAttribute() 进行设置或获取。即使期望值应该是整数，content属性也始终是字符串。例如，要使用content属性将 <input> 元素的最大 maxlength 为42，必须在该元素上调用 setAttribute("maxlength", "42") 。

trans-unit.source: The content in the cell element is aligned to a character. Typical values include a period (.) to align numbers or monetary values. If align is not set to char, this attribute is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 单元格元素中的内容与字符对齐。典型值包括句点（。）以对齐数字或货币值。如果 align 未设置为 char ，则忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: The content in the cell element is aligned to a character. Typical values include a period (.) to align numbers or monetary values. If align is not set to char, this attribute is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 单元格元素中的内容与字符对齐。典型值包括句点（。）以对齐数字或货币值。如果 align 未设置为 char ，则忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: The content inside the opening and closing <audio></audio> tags is shown as a fallback in browsers that don't support the element.
trans-unit.target: 的打开和关闭中的内容 <audio></audio> 标签被示出为在浏览器中的回退不支持的元素。

trans-unit.source: The content inside the opening and closing <video></video> tags is shown as a fallback in browsers that don't support the element.
trans-unit.target: 在不支持该元素的浏览器中，开始和结束 <video></video> 标记内的内容显示为后备。

trans-unit.source: The content of a <main> element should be unique to the document. Content that is repeated across a set of documents or document sections such as sidebars, navigation links, copyright information, site logos, and search forms should not be included unless the search form is the main function of the page.
trans-unit.target: <main> 元素的内容对于文档应该是唯一的。除非搜索表单是页面的主要功能，否则不应包括在一组文档或文档部分中重复的内容，例如侧栏，导航链接，版权信息，站点徽标和搜索表单。

trans-unit.source: The content of the page that the embedded context is to contain. This attribute is expected to generally be used together with the sandbox attribute. If a browser supports the srcdoc attribute, it will override the content specified in the src attribute (if present). If a browser does not support the srcdoc attribute, it will show the file specified in the src attribute instead (if present). Note that if the content of the attribute contains a script tag then a closing script tag is required for the script to run, even if nothing else comes after the script.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入式上下文要包含的页面内容。该属性通常应与 sandbox 属性一起使用。如果浏览器支持 srcdoc 属性，它将覆盖 src 属性中指定的内容（如果存在）。如果浏览器不不支持 srcdoc 属性，它会显示在指定的文件 src 属性，而不是（如果存在的话）。请注意，如果属性的内容包含脚本标记，那么即使脚本后面没有其他内容，运行脚本也需要关闭脚本标记。

trans-unit.source: The content of this attribute represents the value to be submitted with the form, should this option be selected. If this attribute is omitted, the value is taken from the text content of the option element.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了这个选项,这个属性的内容代表了与表单一起提交的值。如果省略该属性,则取自选项元素的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: The content to be edited is taken from the database and loaded into an HTML form to allow the user to make changes.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的内容是从数据库中提取出来的,并加载到一个HTML表格中,让用户进行修改。

trans-unit.source: The content type of the data specified by classid.
trans-unit.target: classid指定的数据的内容类型。

trans-unit.source: The control's UI varies in general from browser to browser; at the moment support is patchy, see Browser compatibility for further details. In unsupported browsers, the control degrades gracefully to a simple <input type="text">.
trans-unit.target: 控件的UI通常因浏览器而异；目前支持不完整，请参阅浏览器兼容性以获取更多详细信息。在不受支持的浏览器中，该控件会正常降级为简单的 <input type="text">.

trans-unit.source: The control's UI varies in general from browser to browser; at the moment support is patchy, with only Chrome/Opera and Edge on desktop — and most modern mobile browser versions — having usable implementations. In browsers that don't support month inputs, the control degrades gracefully to a simple <input type="text">, although there may be automatic validation of the entered text to ensure it's formatted as expected.
trans-unit.target: 控件的UI通常因浏览器而异；目前支持不完整，只有台式机上的Chrome / Opera和Edge（以及大多数现代移动浏览器版本）才具有可用的实现。在不支持 month 输入的浏览器中，该控件会优雅地降级为简单的 <input type="text"> ，尽管可能会自动验证输入的文本以确保其格式符合预期。

trans-unit.source: The control's user interface varies from browser to browser; cross-browser support is currently a bit limited, with only Chrome/Opera and Microsoft Edge supporting it at this time. In non-supporting browsers, the control degrades gracefully to function identically to <input type="text">.
trans-unit.target: 控件的用户界面因浏览器而异；跨浏览器的支持目前受到限制，目前只有Chrome / Opera和Microsoft Edge支持。在不支持的浏览器中，控件会正常降级以与 <input type="text"> 相同地起作用。

trans-unit.source: The control's user interface will vary from browser to browser. Support is good in modern browsers, with Safari being the sole major browser not yet implementing it; in Safari, and any other browsers that don't support <time>, it degrades gracefully to <input type="text">.
trans-unit.target: 控件的用户界面因浏览器而异。现代浏览器提供了很好的支持，其中Safari是唯一尚未实现的主流浏览器。在Safari和任何其他不支持 <time> 的浏览器中，它将正常降级为 <input type="text"> 。

trans-unit.source: The country code, such as "1" for the United States, Canada, and other areas in North America and parts of the Caribbean.
trans-unit.target: 国家代码,如 "1 "代表美国、加拿大、北美其他地区和加勒比部分地区;

trans-unit.source: The currency in which the transaction is to take place.
trans-unit.target: 进行交易的货币;

trans-unit.source: The current numeric value. This must be between the minimum and maximum values (min attribute and max attribute) if they are specified. If unspecified or malformed, the value is 0. If specified, but not within the range given by the min attribute and max attribute, the value is equal to the nearest end of the range.
trans-unit.target: 当前数值。如果已指定，则该值必须介于最小值和最大值之间（ min 属性和 max 属性）。如果未指定或格式错误，则值为0。如果已指定，但不在 min 属性和 max 属性指定的范围内，则该值等于该范围的最近端。

trans-unit.source: The custom validFileType() function takes a File object as a parameter, then loops through the list of allowed file types, checking if any matches the file's type property. If a match is found, the function returns true. If no match is found, it returns false.
trans-unit.target: 定制的 validFileType() 函数将 File 对象作为参数，然后遍历允许的文件类型列表，检查是否与文件的 type 属性匹配。如果找到匹配项，则该函数返回 true 。如果未找到匹配项，则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The date and time at which the calendar entry was created, normalized to an ISO8601 date.
trans-unit.target: 创建日历条目的日期和时间,标准化为ISO8601日期。

trans-unit.source: The date and time at which the contact was last revised.
trans-unit.target: 最后一次修改联系的日期和时间;

trans-unit.source: The date and time at which the event begins, normalized to an ISO8601 date. Required.
trans-unit.target: 事件开始的日期和时间，已标准化为ISO8601日期。需要。

trans-unit.source: The date and time at which the event ends, normalized to an ISO8601 date.
trans-unit.target: 事件结束的日期和时间,标准化为ISO8601日期。

trans-unit.source: The date and time at which the event was last modified, normalized to an ISO8601 date.
trans-unit.target: 事件最后修改的日期和时间,标准化为ISO8601日期。

trans-unit.source: The day of the month of a birth date.
trans-unit.target: 生辰八字月日。

trans-unit.source: The declared character encoding must match the one the page was saved with to avoid garbled characters and security holes.
trans-unit.target: 声明的字符编码必须与页面保存的编码一致,以避免出现乱码和安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: The default controls have a display value of inline by default, and it is often a good idea set the value to block to improve control over positioning and layout, unless you want it to sit within a text block or similar.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，默认控件的 display 值为 inline ，通常最好将值设置为 block 以改善对位置和布局的控制，除非您希望它位于文本块或类似文本中。

trans-unit.source: The default stepping value for number inputs is 1, allowing only integers to be entered, unless the stepping base is not an integer; for example, if you set min to -10 and value to 1.5, then a step of 1 will allow only values such as 1.5, 2.5, 3.5,... in the positive direction and -0.5, -1.5, -2.5,... in the negative direction.
trans-unit.target: number 输入的默认步进值为1，除非步进基数不是整数，否则仅允许输入整数；否则，默认值为1 。例如，如果将 min 设置为-10并将 value 设置为1.5，则1的 step 长将只允许正方向上的值为1.5、2.5、3.5，...，以及-0.5，-1.5，-2.5等。 ..处于负面方向。

trans-unit.source: The default value of color-adjust, economy, indicates that the browser is allowed to make appearance changes as it deems necessary in order to try to optimize the legibility and/or print economy of the content, given the type of output device the document is being drawn onto.
trans-unit.target: 的默认值 color-adjust ， economy ，指示浏览器被允许作出其为了认为必要的尝试优化所述内容的易读性和/或打印经济外观的变化，给定的输出设备的类型的文档被被吸引。

trans-unit.source: The default value when this attribute is not specified is left.
trans-unit.target: 未指定此属性时的默认值 left 。

trans-unit.source: The default values may vary between devices and browsers.
trans-unit.target: 默认值可能因设备和浏览器而异。

trans-unit.source: The differences that matter here—for the purposes of discussing row and column spans—are in the first few lines of the code above. Note the use of rowspan on to make the "Name", "ID", and "Balance" headers occupy two rows instead of just one, and the use of colspan to make the "Membership Dates" header cell span across two columns.
trans-unit.target: 为了讨论行和列的跨度，此处重要的区别在上述代码的前几行中。请注意，使用 rowspan 来使“名称”，“ ID”和“余额”标头占据两行而不是仅占据两行，并且使用 colspan 来使“成员资格日期”标头单元跨越两列。

trans-unit.source: The direction in which text should be rendered in this element's contents. Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: 在这个元素的内容中,文本应该呈现的方向。可能的值是:

trans-unit.source: The directionality of text embedded in <bdi>does not influence the directionality of the surrounding text.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入在 <bdi> 中的文本的方向性不会影响周围文本的方向性。

trans-unit.source: The directionality of text embedded in <bdi>is not influenced by the directionality of the surrounding text.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入在 <bdi> 中的文本的方向性不受周围文本的方向性影响。

trans-unit.source: The disclosure triangle itself can be customized, although this is not as broadly supported. There are variations in how browsers support this customization due to experimental implementations as the element was standardized, so we'll have to use multiple approaches for a while.
trans-unit.target: 披露三角形本身是可以定制的,尽管这并没有得到广泛的支持。由于该元素被标准化,浏览器对这种定制的支持方式存在着实验性实现的差异,所以我们暂时要使用多种方法。

trans-unit.source: The displayed height of the resource, in CSS pixels. This must be an absolute value; percentages are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 资源的显示高度，以CSS像素为单位。这必须是绝对值；百分比是不会允许的。

trans-unit.source: The displayed size of the canvas can be changed using a stylesheet. The image is scaled during rendering to fit the styled size. If your renderings seem distorted, try specifying your width and height attributes explicitly in the <canvas> attributes, and not using CSS.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用样式表更改画布的显示大小。在渲染过程中缩放图像以适合样式大小。如果渲染看起来失真，请尝试在 <canvas> 属性中明确指定 width 和 height 属性，而不要使用CSS。

trans-unit.source: The displayed width of the resource, in CSS pixels. This must be an absolute value; percentages are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 资源的显示宽度（以CSS像素为单位）。这必须是绝对值；百分比是不会允许的。

trans-unit.source: The distinction of block-level vs. inline elements was used in HTML specifications up to 4.01. In HTML5, this binary distinction is replaced with a more complex set of content categories. While the "inline" category roughly corresponds to the category of phrasing content, the "block-level" category doesn't directly correspond to any HTML5 content category, but "block-level" and "inline" elements combined together correspond to the flow content in HTML5. There are also additional categories, e.g. interactive content.
trans-unit.target: 直到4.01的HTML规范都使用了块级元素与内联元素的区别。在HTML5中，这种二进制区别被一组更复杂的内容类别所取代。尽管“内联”类别大致对应于措辞内容的类别，但“块级”类别并不直接对应于任何HTML5内容类别，但是组合在一起的“块级”和“内联”元素对应于流程 HTML5中的内容。还有其他类别，例如交互式内容。

trans-unit.source: The exact meaning of a global identifier is determined by the vocabulary's specification. It is left to such specifications to define whether multiple items of the same global identifier (whether on the same page or different pages) are allowed to exist, and what processing rules for that vocabulary are, with respect to handling the case of multiple items with the same ID.
trans-unit.target: 全局标识符的确切含义由词汇的规范决定。由这些规范来定义是否允许同一全局标识符的多个项目(无论是在同一页面还是不同的页面)存在,以及该词汇在处理具有相同ID的多个项目的情况下,其处理规则是什么。

trans-unit.source: The exact meaning of an itemtype's global identifier is provided by the definition of that identifier within the specified vocabulary. The vocabulary defines whether several items with the same global identifier can coexist and, if so, how items with the same identifier are handled.
trans-unit.target: itemtype 全局标识符的确切含义由指定词汇表中该标识符的定义提供。词汇表定义了具有相同全局标识符的多个项目是否可以共存，如果可以，则如何处理具有相同标识符的项目。

trans-unit.source: The following non-standard attributes are available to search input fields. As a general rule, you should avoid using them unless it can't be helped.
trans-unit.target: 以下非标准属性可用于搜索输入字段。一般来说,除非万不得已,否则您应该避免使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The following non-standard attributes are available to telephone number input fields. As a general rule, you should avoid using them unless it can't be helped.
trans-unit.target: 以下非标准属性可用于电话号码输入字段。一般来说,除非万不得已,否则您应该避免使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The following simple example embeds an image into the page, and includes alternative text to improve accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 下面这个简单的例子将图像嵌入到页面中,并包含替代文本以提高访问性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the structured data from the preceding example.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了前面例子中的结构化数据。

trans-unit.source: The foreground (text) color is specified by setting the color property to hsl(0deg, 100%, 100%). This is one of many ways to specify the color white.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 color 属性设置为 hsl(0deg, 100%, 100%) 来指定前景色（文本）。这是指定白色的多种方法之一。

trans-unit.source: The form control that the label is labeling is called the labeled control of the label element. One input can be associated with multiple labels.
trans-unit.target: 标签正在标记的表单控件称为标签元素的标签控件。一个输入可以与多个标签关联。

trans-unit.source: The form element that the <textarea> element is associated with (its "form owner"). The value of the attribute must be the id of a form element in the same document. If this attribute is not specified, the <textarea> element must be a descendant of a form element. This attribute enables you to place <textarea> elements anywhere within a document, not just as descendants of form elements.
trans-unit.target: <textarea> 元素所关联的form元素（其“表单所有者”）。该属性的值必须是同一文档中表单元素的 id 。如果未指定此属性，则 <textarea> 元素必须是form元素的后代。此属性使您可以将 <textarea> 元素放置在文档中的任何位置，而不仅仅是表单元素的后代。

trans-unit.source: The form element that the button is associated with (its form owner). The value of the attribute must be the id attribute of a <form> element in the same document. If this attribute is not specified, the <button> element will be associated to an ancestor <form> element, if one exists. This attribute enables you to associate <button> elements to <form> elements anywhere within a document, not just as descendants of <form> elements.
trans-unit.target: 与按钮关联的表单元素（其表单所有者）。该属性的值必须是同一文档中 <form> 元素的id属性。如果未指定此属性，则 <button> 元素将与祖先 <form> 元素（如果存在）关联。此属性使您可以将 <button> 元素与文档中任何位置的 <form> 元素相关联，而不仅仅是 <form> 元素的后代。

trans-unit.source: The form element that this element is associated with (its form owner). The value of the attribute must be an id of a <form> element in the same document. If this attribute is not specified, this element must be a descendant of a <form> element. This attribute enables you to place <keygen> elements anywhere within a document, not just as descendants of their form elements.
trans-unit.target: 该元素所关联的form元素（它的表单owner）。该属性的值必须是一个 id 一个的 <form> 在同一文件中的元素。如果未指定此属性，则此元素必须是 <form> 元素的后代。此属性使您可以将 <keygen> 元素放置在文档中的任何位置，而不仅仅是它们的form元素的后代。

trans-unit.source: The form element, if any, that the object element is associated with (its form owner). The value of the attribute must be an ID of a <form> element in the same document.
trans-unit.target: 与该object元素关联的form元素（如果有）（它的form owner）。该属性的值必须是同一文档中 <form> 元素的ID 。

trans-unit.source: The form that requests the month and year looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 请求月份和年份的表格是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The form's data is included in the body of the request that is sent to the URL given by the formaction or action attribute using an HTTP push request. This method supports complex data and file attachments.
trans-unit.target: 表单的数据包含在请求的主体中，该请求的主体使用HTTP push 请求发送到由 formaction 或 action 属性指定的URL 。此方法支持复杂的数据和文件附件。

trans-unit.source: The format for lines of data varies from section to section. In the explicit (CACHE:) section, each line is a valid URI or IRI reference to a resource to cache (no wildcard characters are allowed in this sections). Whitespace is allowed before and after the URI or IRI on each line. In the Fallback section each line is a valid URI or IRI reference to a resource, followed by a fallback resource that is to be served up when a connection with the server cannot be made. In the network section, each line is a valid URI or IRI reference to a resource to fetch from the network (or the wildcard character * can be used in this section).
trans-unit.target: 数据行的格式因节而异。在显式（ CACHE: )节中，每一行都是对要缓存的资源的有效URI或IRI引用（此节中不允许使用通配符）。每行的URI或IRI前后都允许有空格。在“回退”部分中，每一行都是对资源的有效URI或IRI引用，后跟一个回退资源，当无法与服务器建立连接时，将回退该资源。在网络部分中，每一行都是对要从网络中获取的资源的有效URI或IRI引用（或在该部分中可以使用通配符 * ）。

trans-unit.source: The former behavior of the <font> element can be achieved, and even better controlled using the CSS Fonts CSS properties.
trans-unit.target: <font> 元素的以前行为可以实现，甚至可以使用CSS Fonts CSS属性更好地控制。

trans-unit.source: The former behavior of the <font> element can be achieved, and even better controlled using the CSS Fonts properties.
trans-unit.target: <font> 元素的以前行为可以实现，甚至可以使用CSS Fonts属性更好地控制。

trans-unit.source: The four administrative level fields ("address-level1" through "address-level4") describe the address in terms of increasing levels of precision within the country in which the address is located. Each country has its own system of administrative levels, and may arrange the levels in different orders when addresses are written.
trans-unit.target: 四个管理级别字段（ "address-level1" 级别1 ”到 "address-level4" 级别4 ”）以地址所在国家/地区内精度级别的提高来描述地址。每个国家都有自己的行政级别系统，写地址时可以按不同顺序排列级别。

trans-unit.source: The full BCP47 syntax is in-depth enough to mark extremely specific language dialects, but most usage is much simpler.
trans-unit.target: 完整的BCP47语法深入浅出,可以标记出极其特殊的语言方言,但大多数用法就简单多了。

trans-unit.source: The full name as printed on or associated with a payment instrument such as a credit card. Using a full name field is preferred, typically, over breaking the name into pieces.
trans-unit.target: 印在信用卡等支付工具上或与之相关的全名。一般来说,使用全名字段比将名字分成几部分更可取。

trans-unit.source: The generic <input> element and the interface used to manipulate it, HTMLInputElement
trans-unit.target: 通用 <input> 元素和用于操作它的接口 HTMLInputElement

trans-unit.source: The given (or "first") name.
trans-unit.target: 名字(或 "第一个");

trans-unit.source: The greatest value in the range of permitted values. If the value entered into the element exceeds this, the element fails constraint validation. If the value of the max attribute isn't a number, then the element has no maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 允许值范围内的最大值。如果输入到元素的 value 超过此值，则元素将无法通过约束验证。如果 max 属性的值不是数字，则元素没有最大值。

trans-unit.source: The height of the coordinate space in CSS pixels. Defaults to 150.
trans-unit.target: 坐标空间的高度,单位为CSS像素。默认值为150。

trans-unit.source: The height of the displayed resource, in CSS pixels. -- (Absolute values only. NO percentages)
trans-unit.target: 显示的资源的高度，以CSS像素为单位。-（仅绝对值。无百分比）

trans-unit.source: The height of the video's display area, in CSS pixels (absolute values only; no percentages.)
trans-unit.target: 视频显示区域的高度（以CSS像素为单位）（仅绝对值；无百分比）。

trans-unit.source: The height, in CSS pixels, at which to draw the image
trans-unit.target: 绘制图像的高度,以CSS像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The hour and minutes values for their <select> elements are dynamically generated.
trans-unit.target: 它们的 <select> 元素的小时和分钟值是动态生成的。

trans-unit.source: The hyperlink target for the area. Its value is a valid URL. In HTML4, either this attribute or the nohref attribute must be present in the element. In HTML5, this attribute may be omitted; if so, the area element does not represent a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 该区域的超链接目标。它的值是一个有效的URL。在HTML4中，此属性或nohref属性必须存在于元素中。在HTML5中，可以省略此属性。如果是这样，则area元素不表示超链接。

trans-unit.source: The idea here is that during step 2, the ID of the record being updated is kept in a hidden input. When the form is submitted in step 3, the ID is automatically sent back to the server with the record content. The ID lets the site's server-side component know exactly which record needs to be updated with the submitted data.
trans-unit.target: 这里的想法是,在步骤2中,被更新记录的ID被保存在一个隐藏的输入中。当第3步提交表单时,ID会和记录内容一起自动发回服务器。这个ID可以让网站的服务器端组件知道到底是哪条记录需要用提交的数据进行更新。

trans-unit.source: The image URL. This attribute is mandatory for the <img> element. On browsers supporting srcset, src is treated like a candidate image with a pixel density descriptor 1x unless an image with this pixel density descriptor is already defined in srcset, or unless srcset contains 'w' descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 图片网址。此属性对于 <img> 元素是必需的。在支持 srcset 的浏览器上，除非已在 srcset, 定义了具有此像素密度描述符的图像，或者除非 srcset 包含' w '描述符，否则将 src 视为像素密度描述符为 1x 的候选图像。

trans-unit.source: The image formats supported by Firefox are:
trans-unit.target: 火狐支持的图片格式有:

trans-unit.source: The information shown below has been pulled from MDN's Github (https://github.com/mdn/browser-compat-data).
trans-unit.target: 下面显示的信息来自MDN的Github（https://github.com/mdn/browser-compat-data）。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the button. It defines the value associated with the button which is submitted with the form data. This value is passed to the server in params when the form is submitted.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的初始值。它定义了与按钮相关的值,该值与表单数据一起提交。这个值在表单提交时以params形式传递给服务器。

trans-unit.source: The input control's value. When specified in the HTML, this is the initial value, and from then on it can be altered or retrieved at any time using JavaScript to access HTMLInputElement.value. The value attribute is always optional.
trans-unit.target: 输入控件的值。在HTML中指定时，这是初始值，此后可以使用JavaScript访问 HTMLInputElement.value 随时对其进行更改或检索。该 value 属性始终是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The input is now considered valid when a single e-mail address is entered, or when any number of e-mail addresses separated by commas and, optionally, some number of whitespace characters are present.
trans-unit.target: 现在,当输入一个单一的电子邮件地址,或任何数量的电子邮件地址由逗号和一些可选的空白字符分隔时,输入被视为有效。

trans-unit.source: The input type is recognized, but there is no date-specific control.
trans-unit.target: 输入类型被识别,但没有特定的日期控制。

trans-unit.source: The input type is recognized, but there is no month-specific control.
trans-unit.target: 输入类型被识别,但没有特定月份的控制。

trans-unit.source: The input value is automatically validated to ensure that it's either empty or a properly-formatted URL before the form can be submitted. The :valid and :invalid CSS pseudo-classes are automatically applied as appropriate to visually denote whether the current value of the field is a valid URL or not.
trans-unit.target: 在提交表单之前，将自动验证输入值，以确保其为空或格式正确的URL。的 :valid 和 :invalid CSS伪类适当自动应用到视觉表示字段的当前值是否是一个有效的URL或没有。

trans-unit.source: The input value is automatically validated to ensure that it's either empty or a properly-formatted e-mail address (or list of addresses) before the form can be submitted. The :valid and :invalid CSS pseudo-classes are automatically applied as appropriate to visually denote whether the current value of the field is a valid e-mail address or not.
trans-unit.target: 在提交表单之前，将自动验证输入值，以确保其为空或格式正确的电子邮件地址（或地址列表）。的 :valid 和 :invalid CSS伪类会自动适当视觉表示字段的当前值是否是一个有效的e-mail地址或不施加到。

trans-unit.source: The input will fail constraint validation if the length of the text entered into the field is fewer than minlength UTF-16 code units long. Constraint validation is only applied when the value is changed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入到字段中的文本的长度小于 minlength UTF-16代码单元的长度，则输入将无法通过约束验证。约束验证仅在用户更改值时应用。

trans-unit.source: The input will fail constraint validation if the length of the text entered into the field is greater than minlength UTF-16 code units long.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入到字段中的文本的长度大于 minlength UTF-16代码单元的长度，则输入将无法通过约束验证。

trans-unit.source: The input will fail constraint validation if the length of the text value of the field is greater than maxlength UTF-16 code units long. Constraint validation is only applied when the value is changed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段的文本值的长度大于 maxlength UTF-16代码单元的长度，则输入将无法通过约束验证。约束验证仅在用户更改值时应用。

trans-unit.source: The input's current value
trans-unit.target: 输入的当前值

trans-unit.source: The input's name, to identify the input in the data submitted with the form's data
trans-unit.target: 输入的名称,用来标识表单数据提交的数据中的输入内容。

trans-unit.source: The intended meaning or purpose of the enclosed text should be what determines which element you use. Communicating meaning is what semantics are all about.
trans-unit.target: 附文的预期意义或目的应该是决定你使用哪个元素的原因。传达意义是语义学的目的。

trans-unit.source: The interface on which <tr> is based.
trans-unit.target: <tr> 所基于的接口。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic height of the image in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 图像的固有高度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: The intrinsic width of the image in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 图像的固有宽度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: The item types must all be types defined in applicable specifications (such as schema.org), and must all be defined to use the same vocabulary.
trans-unit.target: 项目类型必须全部是在适用规范中定义的类型（例如schema.org），并且必须全部定义为使用相同的词汇表。

trans-unit.source: The itemid attribute can only be specified on elements which have both an itemscope attribute and an itemtype attribute specified. They must only be specified on elements with an itemscope attribute, whose itemtype attribute specifies a vocabulary not supporting global identifiers for items, as defined by that vocabulary's specification.
trans-unit.target: itemid属性只能指定在同时指定了itemscope属性和itemtype属性的元素上。它们只能被指定在具有 itemscope 属性的元素上,而其 itemtype 属性指定了一个不支持项目全局标识符的词汇,如该词汇的规范所定义。

trans-unit.source: The itemtype attribute can only be specified on elements which have an itemscope attribute specified.
trans-unit.target: itemtype属性只能指定在有 itemscope属性的元素上。

trans-unit.source: The key is to use the crossorigin attribute by setting crossOrigin on the HTMLImageElement into which the image will be loaded. This tells the browser to request cross-origin access when trying to download the image data.
trans-unit.target: 关键是使用 crossorigin 通过设置属性 crossOrigin 上 HTMLImageElement 图像将被加载到其中。这告诉浏览器在尝试下载图像数据时请求跨域访问。

trans-unit.source: The label text is not only visually associated with its corresponding text input; it is programmatically associated with it too. This means that for example a screenreader will read out the label when the user is focused on the form input, making it easier for an assistive technology user to understand what data should be entered.
trans-unit.target: 标签文本不仅在视觉上与相应的文本输入相关联,在程序上也与之相关联。这意味着,例如,当用户专注于表格输入时,屏幕阅读器将读出标签,使辅助技术用户更容易理解应该输入什么数据。

trans-unit.source: The latest (time-wise) year and week number, in the string format discussed in the Value section above, to accept. If the value entered into the element exceeds this, the element fails constraint validation. If the value of the max attribute isn't a valid week string, then the element has no maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 接受上面“ 值”部分中讨论的字符串格式的最新（按时间）年和周数。如果输入到元素的 value 超过此值，则元素将无法通过约束验证。如果 max 属性的值不是有效的周字符串，则该元素没有最大值。

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time to accept
trans-unit.target: 接受的最新日期和时间

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time to accept. If the value entered into the element is later than this timestamp, the element fails constraint validation. If the value of the max attribute isn't a valid string which follows the format "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm", then the element has no maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 接受的最新日期和时间。如果 value 输入到单元晚于该时间戳，元素失败约束验证。如果 max 属性的值不是遵循 "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm" 格式的有效字符串，则该元素没有最大值。

trans-unit.source: The latest date to accept
trans-unit.target: 接受的最晚日期

trans-unit.source: The latest date to accept. If the value entered into the element is later than this date, the element fails constraint validation. If the value of the max attribute isn't a valid string which follows the format "yyyy-MM-dd", then the element has no maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 接受的最新日期。如果 value 进入元素迟于该日期，该元素失败约束验证。如果 max 属性的值不是遵循 "yyyy-MM-dd" 格式的有效字符串，则该元素没有最大值。

trans-unit.source: The latest time to accept, in the syntax described under Time value format
trans-unit.target: 按照时间值格式下描述的语法接受的最晚时间

trans-unit.source: The latest year and month to accept as a valid input
trans-unit.target: 接受有效输入的最近年份和月份。

trans-unit.source: The latest year and month to accept, in the same "yyyy-MM" format described above. If the value of the element is less than this, the element fails constraint validation. If a value is specified for min that isn't a valid year and month string, the input has no minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 以与上述相同的 "yyyy-MM" 格式接受的最新年份和月份。如果元素的 value 小于此值，则该元素将无法通过约束验证。如果为 min 指定的值不是有效的年份和月份字符串，则输入没有最小值。

trans-unit.source: The latest year and month, in the string format discussed in the Value section above, to accept. If the value entered into the element exceeds this, the element fails constraint validation. If the value of the max attribute isn't a valid string in "yyyy-MM" format, then the element has no maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 接受上面“ 值”部分中讨论的字符串格式的最新年份和月份。如果输入到元素的 value 超过此值，则元素将无法通过约束验证。如果 max 属性的值不是 "yyyy-MM" 格式的有效字符串，则该元素没有最大值。

trans-unit.source: The latest year and week to accept as valid input
trans-unit.target: 接受最近的年份和星期作为有效输入。

trans-unit.source: The latest year and week to accept. If the value of the element is less than this, the element fails constraint validation. If a value is specified for min that isn't a valid week string, the input has no minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 接受的最新年份和星期。如果元素的 value 小于此值，则该元素将无法通过约束验证。如果为 min 指定的值不是有效的星期字符串，则输入没有最小值。

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the geographic location, represented as a floating-point number. Required.
trans-unit.target: 地理位置的纬度，表示为浮点数。需要。

trans-unit.source: The length of the event. This can be things such as "1w" for one week, or "1h" for one hour. See the description in RFC 2445 for details.
trans-unit.target: 事件的持续时间。可能是“ 1w”持续一周或“ 1h”持续1小时。有关详细信息，请参见RFC 2445中的描述。

trans-unit.source: The live example above should appear similar to the following images (when using your keyboard tab key):
trans-unit.target: 上面的实战例子应该会出现类似于下面的图像(当使用你的键盘tab键时)。

trans-unit.source: The locality for the address.
trans-unit.target: 地址的地点;

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the geographic location, represented as a floating-point number. Required.
trans-unit.target: 地理位置的经度，表示为浮点数。需要。

trans-unit.source: The lower numeric bound of the high end of the measured range. This must be less than the maximum value (max attribute), and it also must be greater than the low value and minimum value (low attribute and min attribute, respectively), if any are specified. If unspecified, or if greater than the maximum value, the high value is equal to the maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 测量范围高端的数字下限。如果指定了该值，则该值必须小于最大值（ max 属性），并且还必须大于下限值和最小值（分别为 low 属性和min属性）。如果未指定，或者大于最大值，则 high 值等于最大值。

trans-unit.source: The lower numeric bound of the measured range. This must be less than the maximum value (max attribute), if specified. If unspecified, the minimum value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 测量范围的下限值。如果指定，则该值必须小于最大值（ max 属性）。如果未指定，则最小值为0。

trans-unit.source: The lowest value in the range of permitted values. If the value of the element is less than this, the element fails constraint validation. If a value is specified for min that isn't a valid number, the input has no minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 允许值范围内的最小值。如果元素的 value 小于此值，则该元素将无法通过约束验证。如果为 min 指定的值不是有效数字，则输入没有最小值。

trans-unit.source: The magic happens, as usual, in the CSS, where we'll apply colors define the layout for the HTML above.
trans-unit.target: 神奇的事情照例发生在CSS中,我们将应用颜色为上面的HTML定义布局。

trans-unit.source: The main basic differences come in the way browsers handle them. The first thing to note is that some browsers show a cross icon that can be clicked on to remove the search term instantly if desired. The following screenshot comes from Chrome:
trans-unit.target: 主要的基本区别来自于浏览器的处理方式。首先要注意的是,有些浏览器会显示一个十字图标,如果需要的话,可以点击这个图标,瞬间删除搜索词。以下截图来自Chrome浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The manifest attribute references a cache manifest file, which is a text file that lists resources (files) that the browser should cache for your application.
trans-unit.target: 清单属性引用一个缓存清单文件，这是一个文本文件，列出了浏览器应为您的应用程序缓存的资源（文件）。

trans-unit.source: The manifest is being fetched and checked for updates.
trans-unit.target: 正在获取清单并检查更新。

trans-unit.source: The margin of the bottom of the body. This method is non-conforming, use CSS margin-bottom property on the element instead.
trans-unit.target: 身体底部的边缘。此方法不合格，请在元素上使用CSS margin-bottom 属性。

trans-unit.source: The margin of the left of the body. This method is non-conforming, use CSS margin-left property on the element instead.
trans-unit.target: 身体左侧的边缘。此方法不合格，请在元素上使用CSS margin-left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The margin of the right of the body. This method is non-conforming, use CSS margin-right property on the element instead.
trans-unit.target: 身体右侧的边缘。此方法不一致，请在元素上使用CSS margin-right 属性。

trans-unit.source: The margin of the top of the body. This method is non-conforming, use CSS margin-top property on the element instead.
trans-unit.target: 身体顶部的边缘。此方法不合格，请在元素上使用CSS margin-top 属性。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length the value may be, in UTF-16 characters
trans-unit.target: 值的最大长度,UTF-16字符。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length, in UTF-16 characters, to accept as a valid input
trans-unit.target: 最大长度,以UTF-16字符为单位,接受一个有效的输入。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the email input. This must be an integer value 0 or higher. If no maxlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the email input has no maximum length. This value must also be greater than or equal to the value of minlength.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在 email 输入中输入的最大字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。必须为0或更高的整数。如果未指定 maxlength 或指定了无效的值，则 email 输入没有最大长度。此值还必须大于或等于 minlength 的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the text input. This must be an integer value 0 or higher. If no maxlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the text input has no maximum length. This value must also be greater than or equal to the value of minlength.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在 text 输入中输入的最大字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。必须为0或更高的整数。如果未指定 maxlength 或指定了无效的值，则 text 输入将没有最大长度。此值还必须大于或等于 minlength 的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the url input. This must be an integer value 0 or higher. If no maxlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the url input has no maximum length. This value must also be greater than or equal to the value of minlength.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在 url 输入中输入的最大字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。必须为0或更高的整数。如果未指定 maxlength 或指定了无效值，则 url 输入没有最大长度。此值还必须大于或等于 minlength 的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the password field. This must be an integer value 0 or higher. If no maxlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the password field has no maximum length. This value must also be less than or equal to the value of minlength.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在密码字段中输入的最大字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。必须为0或更高的整数。如果未指定 maxlength 或指定了无效的值，则密码字段没有最大长度。此值还必须小于或等于 minlength 的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the search field. This must be an integer value 0 or higher. If no maxlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the search field has no maximum length. This value must also be less than or equal to the value of minlength.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在搜索字段中输入的最大字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。必须为0或更高的整数。如果未指定 maxlength 或指定了无效值，则搜索字段没有最大长度。此值还必须小于或等于 minlength 的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the telephone number field. This must be an integer value 0 or higher. If no maxlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the telephone number field has no maximum length. This value must also be less than or equal to the value of minlength.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在电话号码字段中输入的最大字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。必须为0或更高的整数。如果未指定 maxlength 或指定了无效的值，则电话号码字段将没有最大长度。此值还必须小于或等于 minlength 的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters (unicode code points) that the user can enter. If this value isn't specified, the user can enter an unlimited number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以输入的最大字符数(unicode码点)。如果没有指定这个值,用户可以输入无限个字符。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters the input should accept
trans-unit.target: 输入的最大字符数

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items that should be displayed in the drop-down list of previous search queries. Safari only.
trans-unit.target: 先前搜索查询的下拉列表中应显示的最大项目数。仅限Safari。

trans-unit.source: The maximum permitted value
trans-unit.target: 最大允许值

trans-unit.source: The maximum value to accept
trans-unit.target: 接受的最大数值

trans-unit.source: The maximum value to accept for this input. If the value entered into the element exceeds this, the element fails constraint validation. If the value of the max attribute isn't a number, then the element has no maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 此输入接受的最大值。如果输入到元素的 value 超过此值，则元素将无法通过约束验证。如果 max 属性的值不是数字，则元素没有最大值。

trans-unit.source: The middle name.
trans-unit.target: 中间的名字。

trans-unit.source: The minimum length in characters that will be considered valid
trans-unit.target: 被认为有效的最小字符长度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum length that is considered valid for the field's contents
trans-unit.target: 字段内容被认为有效的最小长度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the email input. This must be an non-negative integer value smaller than or equal to the value specified by maxlength. If no minlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the email input has no minimum length.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以输入 email 输入的最小字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。该值必须是小于或等于 maxlength 指定的值的非负整数值。如果未指定 minlength 或指定的值无效，则 email 输入没有最小长度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the text input. This must be an non-negative integer value smaller than or equal to the value specified by maxlength. If no minlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the text input has no minimum length.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以输入到 text 输入中的最小字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。该值必须是小于或等于 maxlength 指定的值的非负整数值。如果未指定 minlength 或指定了无效的值，则 text 输入将没有最小长度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the url input. This must be an non-negative integer value smaller than or equal to the value specified by maxlength. If no minlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the url input has no minimum length.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以输入到 url 输入中的最小字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。该值必须是小于或等于 maxlength 指定的值的非负整数值。如果未指定 minlength 或指定了无效值，则 url 输入没有最小长度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the password entry field. This must be an integer value greater than or equal to the value specified by maxlength. If no minlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the password input has no minimum length.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在密码输入字段中输入的最小字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。该整数值必须大于或等于 maxlength 指定的值。如果未指定 minlength 或指定的值无效，则密码输入没有最小长度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the search field. This must be an integer value greater than or equal to the value specified by maxlength. If no minlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the search input has no minimum length.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在搜索字段中输入的最小字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。该整数值必须大于或等于 maxlength 指定的值。如果未指定 minlength 或指定了无效值，则搜索输入没有最小长度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of characters (as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the telephone number field. This must be an integer value greater than or equal to the value specified by maxlength. If no minlength is specified, or an invalid value is specified, the search input has no minimum length.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在电话号码字段中输入的最小字符数（以UTF-16代码为单位）。该整数值必须大于或等于 maxlength 指定的值。如果未指定 minlength 或指定了无效值，则搜索输入没有最小长度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of characters (unicode code points) required that the user should enter.
trans-unit.target: 要求用户应输入的最小字符数(unicode码点)。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of characters long the input can be and still be considered valid
trans-unit.target: 输入的最小字符数,可以被认为是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The minimum permitted value
trans-unit.target: 最低允许值

trans-unit.source: The minimum value to accept for this input
trans-unit.target: 该输入的最小值

trans-unit.source: The minimum value to accept for this input. If the value of the element is less than this, the element fails constraint validation. If a value is specified for min that isn't a valid number, the input has no minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 此输入接受的最小值。如果该元素的 value 小于此值，则该元素将无法通过约束验证。如果为 min 指定的值不是有效数字，则输入没有最小值。

trans-unit.source: The missing value default, equivalent to vertical-align: unset; or vertical-align: initial;
trans-unit.target: 缺少的值默认值，等同于 vertical-align: unset; 或 vertical-align: initial;

trans-unit.source: The month in which the payment method expires.
trans-unit.target: 支付方式到期的月份。

trans-unit.source: The month of the year of a birth date.
trans-unit.target: 生辰八字的年月日。

trans-unit.source: The months are hard-coded (as they are always the same), while the day and year values are dynamically generated depending on the currently selected month and year, and the current year respectively (see the code comments below for detailed explanations of how these functions work.) We also decided to dynamically generate the hours and minutes, as there are so many of them!
trans-unit.target: 月份是硬编码的(因为它们总是相同的),而日期和年份的值则分别根据当前选择的月份和年份以及当前的年份动态生成(关于这些函数如何工作的详细解释,请参阅下面的代码注释)。我们还决定动态生成小时和分钟,因为它们的数量太多了!

trans-unit.source: The months are hardcoded (as they are always the same), while the day and year values are dynamically generated depending on the currently selected month and year, and the current year (see the code comments below for detailed explanations of how these functions work.)
trans-unit.target: 月份是硬编码的(因为它们总是相同的),而日期和年份的值是根据当前选择的月份和年份以及当前的年份动态生成的(关于这些函数如何工作的详细解释,请参阅下面的代码注释)。

trans-unit.source: The more modern <button> element.
trans-unit.target: 更现代的 <button> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The most important rule: never use color as the only way to know something. If, for example, you indicate success or failure of an operation by changing the color of a shape from white to green for success and red for failure, users with red-green color-blindness won't be able to use your site properly. Instead, perhaps use both text and color together, so that everyone can understand what's happening.
trans-unit.target: 最重要的规则是:永远不要把颜色作为了解某件事的唯一途径。例如,如果你通过改变形状的颜色来表示操作的成功或失败,从白色到绿色表示成功,红色表示失败,那么有红绿色盲症的用户将无法正常使用你的网站。相反,也许可以同时使用文字和颜色,这样大家就能明白发生了什么。

trans-unit.source: The multiple aria-* attributes, used for improving accessibility.
trans-unit.target: 多个 aria-* 属性，用于改善可访问性。

trans-unit.source: The name _charset_ has a special meaning. If used as the name of an <input> element of type hidden, the input's value is automatically set by the user agent to the character encoding being used to submit the form.
trans-unit.target: 名称 _charset_ 具有特殊含义。如果用作 hidden 类型的 <input> 元素的名称，则用户代理会自动将输入 value 设置为用于提交表单的字符编码。

trans-unit.source: The name associated with the group.
trans-unit.target: 与该组相关的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name attribute gives the map a name so that it can be referenced. The attribute must be present and must have a non-empty value with no space characters. The value of the name attribute must not be a compatibility-caseless match for the value of the name attribute of another map element in the same document. If the id attribute is also specified, both attributes must have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 名称属性给地图起了一个名字,以便于被引用。该属性必须存在,并且必须有一个不含空格的非空值。name属性的值不能与同一文档中另一个map元素的name属性的值相匹配。如果还指定了id属性,则两个属性的值必须相同。

trans-unit.source: The name of an image map (<map>) element to use with the image; this is obsolete. Use the <img> element to create image maps instead
trans-unit.target: 与图像一起使用的图像映射（ <map> ）元素的名称；这已经过时了。使用 <img> 元素创建图像映射

trans-unit.source: The name of the button, which is submitted with the form data.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的名称,与表单数据一起提交。

trans-unit.source: The name of the command as shown to the user.
trans-unit.target: 显示给用户的命令名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the command as shown to the user. Required when a command attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 显示给用户的命令名称。当 command 属性不存在时为必需。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.
trans-unit.target: 控件的名称,与表格数据一起提交。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的名称;

trans-unit.source: The name of the country in which the address is located.
trans-unit.target: 地址所在国的名称;

trans-unit.source: The name of the division or department within the organization with which the contact is associated.
trans-unit.target: (a)与该联络人有联系的组织内的司或部门的名称;

trans-unit.source: The name of the element, exposed in the HTMLFormElement API.
trans-unit.target: 元素的名称，在 HTMLFormElement API中公开。

trans-unit.source: The name of the form. In HTML 4, its use is deprecated (id should be used instead). It must be unique among the forms in a document and not just an empty string in HTML 5.
trans-unit.target: 表单名称。在HTML 4中，不建议使用它（应改用 id ）。它在文档中的表单之间必须唯一，而不仅仅是HTML 5中的空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The name of the group of options, which the browser can use when labeling the options in the user interface. This attribute is mandatory if this element is used.
trans-unit.target: 选项组的名称,浏览器在用户界面上标注选项时可以使用该名称。如果使用此元素,此属性为必填项。

trans-unit.source: The name of the menu as shown to the user. Used within nested menus, to provide a label through which the submenu can be accessed. Must only be specified when the parent element is a <menu> in the context menu state.
trans-unit.target: 显示给用户的菜单名称。在嵌套菜单中使用，以提供一个标签，通过该标签可以访问子菜单。仅在上下文菜单状态下父元素为 <menu> 时才必须指定。

trans-unit.source: The name of the organization with which the contact is associated.
trans-unit.target: 与该联系人有联系的组织名称;

trans-unit.source: The name of the tag. This is the text after the last forward slash in the link. Required.
trans-unit.target: 标签名称。这是链接中最后一个正斜杠之后的文本。需要。

trans-unit.source: The name of valid browsing context (HTML5), or the name of the control (HTML 4).
trans-unit.target: 有效浏览上下文的名称(HTML5),或控件的名称(HTML4)。

trans-unit.source: The non-standard, obsolete HTML <nobr> element prevents the text it contains from automatically wrapping across multiple lines, potentially resulting in the user having to scroll horizontally to see the entire width of the text.
trans-unit.target: 非标准的，过时的HTML <nobr> 元素会阻止其中包含的文本自动跨多行换行，从而可能导致用户不得不水平滚动才能看到文本的整个宽度。

trans-unit.source: The number of up link types indicates the depth difference between the current page and the linked resource.
trans-unit.target: up 链接类型的数量指示当前页面和链接资源之间的深度差。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters wide the input field should be
trans-unit.target: 输入字段的宽度应该是多少个字符?

trans-unit.source: The number of characters wide the input field should be onscreen
trans-unit.target: 输入字段在屏幕上的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels of white space to insert above and below the image. You should use the margin CSS property instead.
trans-unit.target: 在图像上方和下方插入的空白像素数。您应该改用 margin CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels of white space to insert to the left and right of the image. You should use the margin CSS property instead.
trans-unit.target: 要在图像左右两侧插入的空白像素数。您应该改用 margin CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds until the page should be reloaded - only if the content attribute contains a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 content 属性包含正整数时，才应重新加载页面的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds until the page should redirect to another - only if the content attribute contains a positive integer followed by the string ';url=', and a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 content 属性包含一个正整数后跟字符串' ;url= '和有效URL 的页面之前，该页面应重定向到另一页面的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The number of visible text lines for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的可见文字行数。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <acronym> element, whose responsibilities were folded into <abbr>
trans-unit.target: <acronym> 元素已过时，其职责被折叠为 <abbr>

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <element> was part of the Web Components specification; it was intended to be used to define new custom DOM elements.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 <element> 是Web Components规范的一部分；它旨在用于定义新的自定义DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <element> was part of the Web Components specification; it was intended to be used to define new custom DOM elements. It was removed in favor of a JavaScript-driven approach for creating new custom elements; however, that technology is not mature and no browers fully implement it.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 <element> 是Web Components规范的一部分；它旨在用于定义新的自定义DOM元素。删除它是为了使用JavaScript驱动的方法来创建新的自定义元素。但是，该技术还不成熟，没有任何浏览器可以完全实施。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <image> is an obsolete remnant of an ancient version of HTML lost in the mists of time; use the standard <img> element instead.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 <image> 是在时间的迷雾中丢失的旧版HTML的过时残余；请使用标准的 <img> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete <image> is an obsolete remnant of an ancient version of HTML lost in the mists of time; use the standard <img> element instead. Seriously, the specification even literally uses the words "Don't ask" when describing this element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的 <image> 是在时间的迷雾中丢失的旧版HTML的过时残余；请使用标准的 <img> 元素。认真地说，规范在描述此元素时甚至在字面上使用了“不要问”一词。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Applet Element (<applet>) embeds a Java applet into the document; this element has been deprecated in favor of <object>.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Applet元素（ <applet> ）将Java applet嵌入文档中。不推荐使用此元素，而推荐使用 <object> 。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Applet Element (<applet>) embeds a Java applet into the document; this element has been deprecated in favor of <object>.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Applet元素（ <applet> ）将Java applet嵌入文档中。不推荐使用此元素，而推荐使用 <object> 。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Base Font element (<basefont>) sets a default font face, size, and color for the other elements which are descended from its parent element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Base Font元素（ <basefont> ）为从其父元素派生的其他元素设置默认字体，大小和颜色。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Base Font element (<basefont>) sets a default font face, size, and color for the other elements which are descended from its parent element. With this set, the font's size can then be varied relative to the base size using the <font> element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Base Font元素（ <basefont> ）为从其父元素派生的其他元素设置默认字体，大小和颜色。通过此设置，然后可以使用 <font> 元素相对于基本大小来更改字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Big Element (<big>) renders the enclosed text at a font size one level larger than the surrounding text (medium becomes large, for example).
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Big Element（ <big> ）以比周围文本 large 一级的字体大小（例如， medium 变大）呈现了封闭的文本。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Big Element (<big>) renders the enclosed text at a font size one level larger than the surrounding text (medium becomes large, for example). The size is capped at the browser's maximum permitted font size.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Big Element（ <big> ）以比周围文本 large 一级的字体大小（例如， medium 变大）呈现了封闭的文本。大小上限为浏览器允许的最大字体大小。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Center Element (<center>) is a block-level element that displays its block-level or inline contents centered horizontally within its containing element. The container is usually, but isn't required to be, <body>.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Center元素（ <center> ）是一个块级元素，它在其包含元素内水平居中显示其块级或内联内容。容器通常是但不是必需的 <body> 。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Center Element (<center>) is a block-level element that displays its block-level or inline contents centered horizontally within its containing element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Center元素（ <center> ）是一个块级元素，它在其包含元素内水平居中显示其块级或内联内容。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Directory element (<dir>) is used as a container for a directory of files and/or folders, potentially with styles and icons applied by the user agent.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Directory元素（ <dir> ）用作文件和/或文件夹目录的容器，可能带有用户代理应用的样式和图标。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Directory element (<dir>) is used as a container for a directory of files and/or folders, potentially with styles and icons applied by the user agent. Do not use this obsolete element; instead, you should use the <ul> element for lists, including lists of files.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Directory元素（ <dir> ）用作文件和/或文件夹目录的容器，可能带有用户代理应用的样式和图标。请勿使用此过时的元素。相反，您应该对列表使用 <ul> 元素，包括文件列表。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Teletype Text element (<tt>) creates inline text which is presented using the user agent's default monospace font face.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Teletype Text元素（ <tt> ）创建内联文本，该文本使用用户代理的默认等宽字体显示。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML Teletype Text element (<tt>) creates inline text which is presented using the user agent's default monospace font face. This element was created for the purpose of rendering text as it would be displayed on a fixed-width display such as a teletype, text-only screen, or line printer.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML Teletype Text元素（ <tt> ）创建内联文本，该文本使用用户代理的默认等宽字体显示。创建此元素是为了呈现文本，因为它将显示在固定宽度的显示器上，例如电传打字机，纯文本屏幕或行式打印机。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML No Frames or frame fallback element, <noframes>, provides content to be presented in browsers that don't support (or have disabled support for) the <frame> element.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML No Frames或框架回退元素 <noframes> 提供了要在不支持 <frame> 元素（或已禁用）的浏览器中显示的内容。

trans-unit.source: The obsolete HTML No Frames or frame fallback element, <noframes>, provides content to be presented in browsers that don't support (or have disabled support for) the <frame> element. Although most commonly-used browsers support frames, there are exceptions, including certain special-use browsers including some mobile browsers, as well as text-mode browsers.
trans-unit.target: 过时的HTML No Frames或框架回退元素 <noframes> 提供了要在不支持 <frame> 元素（或已禁用）的浏览器中显示的内容。尽管大多数常用的浏览器都支持框架，但也有例外，包括某些特殊用途的浏览器（包括某些移动浏览器）和文本模式浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The operation to activate the accesskey depends on browser and its platform.
trans-unit.target: 激活accesskey的操作取决于浏览器及其平台。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code — to detect whether the browser supports <input type="date">, we create a new <input> element, set its type to date, then immediately check what its type is set to — non-supporting browsers will return text, because the date type falls back to type text. If <input type="date"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI (<select>) instead.
trans-unit.target: 代码的另一部分可能是功能检测代码—要检测浏览器是否支持 <input type="date"> ，我们将创建一个新的 <input> 元素，并将其 type 设置为 date ，然后立即检查它的类型设置为什么-不支持的浏览器将返回 text ，因为 date 类型回退为 text 类型。如果不支持 <input type="date"> ，我们将隐藏本机选择器，并显示后备选择器UI（ <select> ）。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code — to detect whether the browser supports <input type="datetime-local">, we create a new <input> element, set its type to datetime-local, then immediately check what its type is set to. Browsers that don't support datetime-local return text, since that's what datetime-local falls back to. If <input type="datetime-local"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI (<select>) instead.
trans-unit.target: 该代码的另一部分可能是有趣的功能检测代码—为了检测浏览器是否支持 <input type="datetime-local"> ，我们创建了一个新的 <input> 元素，并将其 type 设置为 datetime-local ，然后立即检查其类型设置为。不支持 datetime-local 的浏览器会返回 text ，因为那是 datetime-local 的后代。如果不支持 <input type="datetime-local"> ，我们将隐藏本机选择器，并显示后备选择器UI（ <select> ）。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code — to detect whether the browser supports <input type="time">, we create a new <input> element, set its type to time, then immediately check what its type is set to — non-supporting browsers will return text, because the time type falls back to type text. If <input type="time"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI (<select>s) instead.
trans-unit.target: 该代码的另一部分可能是有趣的功能检测代码—要检测浏览器是否支持 <input type="time"> ，我们创建一个新的 <input> 元素，将其 type 设置为 time ，然后立即检查类型设置为什么-不支持的浏览器将返回 text ，因为 time 类型回退为 text 类型。如果不支持 <input type="time"> ，我们将隐藏本机选择器，并显示后备选择器UI（ <select> s）。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code that may be of interest is the feature detection code. To detect whether the browser supports <input type="week">, we create a new <input> element, set its type to week, then immediately check what its type is set to. Non-supporting browsers will return text, because the week type falls back to type text. If <input type="week"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI (<select>s) instead.
trans-unit.target: 该代码中可能感兴趣的另一部分是特征检测代码。为了检测浏览器是否支持 <input type="week"> ，我们创建了一个新的 <input> 元素，将其 type 设置为 week ，然后立即检查其 type 设置为。不支持的浏览器将返回 text ，因为 week 类型回退为 text 。如果不支持 <input type="week"> ，我们将隐藏本机选择器，并显示后备选择器UI（ <select> s）。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the example that may be of interest is the feature detection code. In order to detect whether the browser supports <input type="month">, we create a new <input> element, set its type to month, then immediately check what its type is set to. Browsers that don't support type month will return text, since that's What month falls back to when not supported. If <input type="month"> is not supported, we hide the native picker and show the fallback picker UI instead.
trans-unit.target: 可能感兴趣的示例的另一部分是特征检测代码。为了检测浏览器是否支持 <input type="month"> ，我们创建了一个新的 <input> 元素，将其 type 设置为 month ，然后立即检查其类型设置为。不支持类型为 month 的浏览器将返回 text ，因为那是不支持的月份。如果不支持 <input type="month"> ，我们将隐藏本机选择器并显示后备选择器UI。

trans-unit.source: The outer item above has two properties, "name" and "band". The "name" is "Amanda", and the "band" is an item in its own right, with two properties, "name" and "size". The "name" of the band is "Jazz Band", and the "size" is "12". The outer item in this example is a top-level microdata item. Items that are not part of others are called top-level microdata items.
trans-unit.target: 上面的外项有两个属性,"名称 "和 "带子"。其中 "名称 "是 "阿曼达","乐队 "本身就是一个项目,有 "名称 "和 "大小 "两个属性。乐队的 "名称 "是 "爵士乐队","大小 "是 "12"。本例中的外项是一个顶层微数据项。不属于其他项的项目称为顶层微数据项。

trans-unit.source: The presence of the ins element is not announced by most screen reading technology in its default configuration. It can be made to be announced by using the CSS content property, along with the ::before and ::after pseudo-elements.
trans-unit.target: 大多数屏幕阅读技术均未在默认配置中宣布 ins 元素的存在。可以通过使用CSS content 属性以及 ::before 和 ::after 伪元素来宣布它。

trans-unit.source: The presence of this Boolean attribute makes this element a declaration only. The object must be instantiated by a subsequent <object> element. In HTML5, repeat the <object> element completely each that that the resource is reused.
trans-unit.target: 此布尔属性的存在使此元素仅成为声明。该对象必须由随后的 <object> 元素实例化。在HTML5中，每一次重复使用<object>元素即完全重复使用资源。

trans-unit.source: The problem with the above example is that the user will not know what the access key is! This is especially true since the modifiers are typically non-standard to avoid conflicts. When building a site, be sure to provide this information in a way that doesn't interfere with the site design (for example by providing an easily accessible link that points to information on what the site access keys are). Adding a tooltip to the button (using the title attribute) can also help, although it's not a complete solution for accessibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: 上面示例的问题是用户将不知道访问密钥是什么！尤其如此，因为修饰符通常是非标准的，以避免冲突。在构建网站时，请确保以不干扰网站设计的方式提供此信息（例如，通过提供易于访问的链接来指向有关网站访问键的信息）。向按钮添加工具提示（使用 title 属性）也可以提供帮助，尽管这并不是出于可访问性目的的完整解决方案。

trans-unit.source: The problem with the above example is that there's no way for the user to know what the access key is! This is especially true since the modifiers are typically non-standard to avoid conflicts. When building a site, be sure to provide this information in a way that doesn't interfere with the site design (for example by providing an easily accessible link that points to information on what the site access keys are). Adding a tooltip to the button (using the title attribute) can also help, although it's not a complete solution for accessibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: 上面的示例的问题在于，用户无法知道访问密钥是什么！尤其如此，因为修饰符通常是非标准的，以避免冲突。在构建网站时，请确保以不干扰网站设计的方式提供此信息（例如，通过提供易于访问的链接来指向有关网站访问键的信息）。向按钮添加工具提示（使用 title 属性）也可以提供帮助，尽管这并不是出于可访问性目的的完整解决方案。

trans-unit.source: The public key and challenge string are DER encoded as PublicKeyAndChallenge, and then digitally signed with the private key to produce a SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge. The SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge is Base64 encoded, and the ASCII data is finally submitted to the server as the value of a form name/value pair, where the name is name as specified by the name attribute of the keygen element. If no challenge string is provided, then it will be encoded as an IA5STRING of length zero.
trans-unit.target: 公钥和质询字符串被DER编码为 PublicKeyAndChallenge ，然后用私钥进行数字签名以生成 SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge 。所述 SignedPublicKeyAndChallenge 是的Base64编码，该ASCII数据最终提交到服务器作为一个形式名称/值对的值，其中名称是 name 由指定的 name 的属性 keygen 元件。如果未提供质询字符串，则它将被编码为长度为零的 IA5STRING 。

trans-unit.source: The publication date and time of an <article> element can be described using the datetime attribute of a <time> element. Note that the pubdate attribute of <time> is no longer a part of the W3C HTML 5 standard.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 <time> 元素的 datetime 属性来描述 <article> 元素的发布日期和时间。请注意， <time> 的 pubdate 属性不再是W3C HTML 5标准的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The script gets a reference to the HTMLInputElement object representing the <input> in the DOM, saving this refence in the variable btn. addEventListener() is then used to establish a function that will be run when click events occur on the button.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本获取对表示DOM中 <input> 的 HTMLInputElement 对象的引用，并将此引用保存在变量 btn 中。然后，使用 addEventListener() 建立在按钮上发生 click 事件时将运行的函数。

trans-unit.source: The script here handles the task of updating the starting color of the border to match the color picker's value. Then two event handlers are added to deal with input from the <input type="color"> element.
trans-unit.target: 此处的脚本处理更新边框的起始颜色以匹配颜色选择器的值的任务。然后，添加两个事件处理程序以处理来自 <input type="color"> 元素的输入。

trans-unit.source: The script should be served with the text/javascript MIME type, but browsers are lenient and only block them if the script is served with an image type (image/*); a video type (video/*); an audio (audio/*) type; or text/csv. If the script is blocked, an error is sent to the element, if not a load event is sent.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本应该以 text/javascript MIME类型提供，但是浏览器比较宽松，只有在脚本以图片类型（ image/* ）提供的情况下，浏览器才会阻止它们。视频类型（ video/* ）；音频（ audio/* ）类型；或 text/csv 。如果脚本被阻止，则 error 会发送到元素，如果未发送，则会发送 load 事件。

trans-unit.source: The script subtag precedes the region subtag if both are present — ru-Cyrl-BY is Russian, written in the Cyrillic alphabet, as spoken in Belarus.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时存在脚本子标签，则该子标签位于区域子标签之前-ru ru-Cyrl-BY 是俄语，用西里尔字母书写，如白俄罗斯所说。

trans-unit.source: The search field will fail constraint validation if the length of the text entered into the field is fewer than minlength UTF-16 code units long.
trans-unit.target: 如果在字段中输入的文本的长度小于 minlength UTF-16代码单元的长度，则搜索字段将无法通过约束验证。

trans-unit.source: The second administrative level, in addresses with at least two of them. In countries with two administrative levels, this would typically be the city, town, village, or other locality in which the address is located.
trans-unit.target: 第二个管理级别，其中包含至少两个。在具有两个行政级别的国家/地区中，通常是地址所在的城市，城镇，村庄或其他地区。

trans-unit.source: The second example show some more complex features:
trans-unit.target: 第二个例子显示了一些更复杂的特征。

trans-unit.source: The second one uses a prompt string, Enter your password as a placeholder. The first, and most obvious, problem with doing this is that as soon as the user types their first character, they no longer have a prompt explaining what that field is for.
trans-unit.target: 第二个使用提示字符串， Enter your password 作为占位符。这样做的第一个也是最明显的问题是，用户输入第一个字符后，他们将不再有提示解释该字段的用途。

trans-unit.source: The second problem is the more serious of the two. As mentioned earlier, with a month input the actual value is always normalized to the format yyyy-mm. On the other hand, in its default configuration, a text input has no idea what format the date should be in, and this is an issue because of the number of different ways in which people write dates. For example:
trans-unit.target: 第二个问题是两者中的一个更为严重。如前所述，在输入 month 的情况下，实际值始终会标准化为 yyyy-mm 格式。另一方面，在其默认配置下， text 输入不知道日期应采用哪种格式，这是一个问题，因为人们书写日期的方式多种多样。例如：

trans-unit.source: The second problem is the more serious of the two; as we mentioned earlier, with a date input, the actual value is always normalized to the format yyyy-mm-dd. With a text input on the other hand, by default the browser has no recognition of what format the date should be in, and there are lots of different ways in which people write dates, for example:
trans-unit.target: 第二个问题是两者中的一个更为严重。如前所述，在输入日期的情况下，实际值始终会标准化为 yyyy-mm-dd 格式。另一方面，在使用文本输入的情况下，默认情况下，浏览器无法识别日期应采用的格式，并且人们用多种不同的方式来写日期，例如：

trans-unit.source: The second problem is the more serious. As mentioned earlier, with a week input the actual value is always normalized to the format yyyy-Www. When the browser falls back to a generic text input, there's nothing to guide the user toward correctly formatting the input (and it's certainly not intuitive). There are multiple ways in which people could write week values; for example:
trans-unit.target: 第二个问题是更严重的。如前所述，在输入 week 的情况下，实际值总是标准化为 yyyy-Www 格式。当浏览器退回通用文本输入时，没有什么可以指导用户正确格式化输入的格式（这肯定是不直观的）。人们可以用多种方式来写星期值。例如：

trans-unit.source: The second problem is the more serious; as mentioned previously, time inputs' values are always normalized to the format hh:mm or hh:mm:ss. With a text input, on the other hand, by default the browser has no idea of what format the time should be in, and there multiple ways in which people write times, such as:
trans-unit.target: 第二个问题是更严重的。如前所述， time 输入的值始终标准化为 hh:mm 或 hh:mm:ss 格式。另一方面，使用文本输入时，默认情况下，浏览器不知道时间应采用哪种格式，人们可以用多种方式编写时间，例如：

trans-unit.source: The second problem is the most serious; as we mentioned earlier, with a datetime-local input, the actual value is always normalized to the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm. With a text input on the other hand, by default the browser has no recognition of what format the date should be in, and there are lots of different ways in which people write dates and times, for example:
trans-unit.target: 第二个问题是最严重的。正如我们前面提到的，使用 datetime-local 输入，实际值总是标准化为 yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm 格式。另一方面，使用文本输入时，默认情况下，浏览器无法识别日期应采用的格式，并且人们可以使用许多不同的方式来写日期和时间，例如：

trans-unit.source: The second-least specific portion of the address is the city or town name, so "address-level2" is "Exampleville" in this example address.
trans-unit.target: "address-level2" 倒数第二个特定部分是城市或城镇名称，因此在此示例地址中，“ address-level2”为“ Exampleville”。

trans-unit.source: The section header line may include whitespaces, but must include the colon (:) in the section name.
trans-unit.target: 节头线可包括空格，但必须包括冒号（ : 在该节的名称）。

trans-unit.source: The security code for the payment instrument; on credit cards, this is the 3-digit verification number on the back of the card.
trans-unit.target: 支付工具的安全代码;在信用卡上,这是卡片背面的3位数验证码。

trans-unit.source: The selected files' are returned by the element's HTMLInputElement.files property, which is a FileList object containing a list of File objects. The FileList behaves like an array, so you can check its length property to get the number of selected files.
trans-unit.target: 所选文件由元素的 HTMLInputElement.files 属性返回，该属性是一个 FileList 对象，其中包含 File 对象的列表。该 FileList 的行为像一个数组，这样你就可以检查它的 length 属性来获取选定文件的数量。

trans-unit.source: The semantic <code>, <var>, <kbd>, and <samp> elements
trans-unit.target: 语义 <code> ， <var> ， <kbd> 和 <samp> 元素

trans-unit.source: The semantic pairing of <input> and <label> elements is useful for assistive technologies such as screen readers. By pairing them using the <label>'s for attribute, you bond the label to the input in a way that lets screen readers describe inputs to users more precisely.
trans-unit.target: <input> 和 <label> 元素的语义配对对于诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助技术很有用。通过使用 <label> 的 for 属性将它们配对，可以将标签绑定到输入，使屏幕阅读器可以更精确地向用户描述输入。

trans-unit.source: The server would set the value of the hidden input with the ID "postID" to the ID of the post in its database before sending the form to the user's browser, and would use that information when the form is returned to know which database record to update with modified information. No scripting is needed in the content to handle this.
trans-unit.target: 在将表单发送到用户的浏览器之前，服务器会将ID为 "postID" 的隐藏输入的值设置为其数据库中帖子的ID，并在返回表单时使用该信息来知道要向哪个数据库记录使用修改过的信息进行更新。内容中无需脚本即可处理。

trans-unit.source: The shape of the associated hot spot. The specifications for HTML 5 and HTML 4 define the values rect, which defines a rectangular region; circle, which defines a circular region; poly, which defines a polygon; and default, which indicates the entire region beyond any defined shapes. Many browsers, notably Internet Explorer 4 and higher, support circ, polygon, and rectangle as valid values for shape; these values are .
trans-unit.target: 关联热点的形状。HTML 5和HTML 4的规范定义了 rect 值，该值定义了一个矩形区域。 circle ，它定义一个圆形区域； poly ，它定义一个多边形；和 default ，指示超出任何定义形状的整个区域。许多浏览器，尤其是Internet Explorer 4和更高版本，都支持 circ ， polygon 和 rectangle 作为shape的有效值；这些值是。

trans-unit.source: The size of the control is set to be 150 pixels long by 20 pixels tall. The margins are set to 0 and the transform-origin is shifted to the middle of the space the slider rotates through; since the slider is configured to be 150 pixels wide, it rotates through a box which is 150 pixels on each side. Offsetting the origin by 75px on each axis means we will rotate around the center of that space. Finally, we rotate counter-clockwise by 90°. The result: a range input which is rotated so the maximum value is at the top and the minimum value is at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 控件的大小设置为150像素长x 20像素高。边距设置为0， transform-origin 移动到滑块旋转通过的空间的中间；由于滑块配置为150像素宽，因此它将旋转通过每边150像素的框。在每个轴上将原点偏移75像素，这意味着我们将围绕该空间的中心旋转。最后，我们将逆时针旋转90°。结果：旋转范围输入，因此最大值在顶部，最小值在底部。

trans-unit.source: The size of the file in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 文件的大小,单位为字节。

trans-unit.source: The slider can be oriented vertically by setting the writing-mode: bt-lr style on the input element.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 input 元素上设置 writing-mode: bt-lr 样式，可以垂直定向滑块。

trans-unit.source: The slider can be oriented vertically by setting the non-standard -webkit-appearance: slider-vertical style on the input element. You shouldn't use this, since it's proprietary, unless you include appropriate fallbacks for users of other browsers.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 input 元素上设置非标准的 -webkit-appearance: slider-vertical 样式，可以将滑块垂直定向。除非您为其他浏览器的用户提供适当的备用，否则不应使用它，因为它是专有的。

trans-unit.source: The slot's name.
trans-unit.target: 槽的名字。

trans-unit.source: The source of the suggested values is generally up to the browser; typically values come from past values entered by the user, but they may also come from pre-configured values. For instance, a browser might let the user save their name, address, phone number, and email addresses for autocomplete purposes. Perhaps the browser offers the ability to save encrypted credit card information, for autocompletion following an authentication procedure.
trans-unit.target: 建议值的来源一般由浏览器决定;通常值来自用户过去输入的值,但也可能来自预先配置的值。例如,浏览器可能会让用户保存他们的姓名、地址、电话号码和电子邮件地址,以便于自动填写。也许浏览器提供了保存加密的信用卡信息的功能,以便在认证程序后自动完成。

trans-unit.source: The specification does not force the browser to follow the value of this attribute; it is a mere hint.
trans-unit.target: 该规范并没有强制浏览器遵循该属性的值,它只是一个提示。

trans-unit.source: The specified src URL is the same as the URL of the page the user is currently on.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 src URL与用户当前所在页面的URL相同。

trans-unit.source: The specified image is corrupted in some way that prevents it from being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 指定的图像因某种原因损坏而无法加载。

trans-unit.source: The specified image is in a format not supported by the user agent.
trans-unit.target: 指定的图像采用用户代理不支持的格式。

trans-unit.source: The specified image's metadata is corrupted in such a way that it's impossible to retrieve its dimensions, and no dimensions were specified in the <img> element's attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定图像的元数据已损坏，无法检索其尺寸，并且在 <img> 元素的属性中未指定尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The start tag is mandatory, but, as it is a void element, the use of an end tag is forbidden.
trans-unit.target: 开始标签是必须的,但是,由于它是一个无效元素,所以禁止使用结束标签。

trans-unit.source: The start tag is mandatory.
trans-unit.target: 开始标签是必须的。

trans-unit.source: The start tag is mandatory. The end tag is optional if this element is immediately followed by another <optgroup> element, or if the parent element has no more content.
trans-unit.target: 开始标记是必需的。如果此元素后面紧跟另一个 <optgroup> 元素，或者如果父元素没有更多内容，则end标记是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The start tag is mandatory. The end tag is optional if this element is immediately followed by another <option> element or an <optgroup>, or if the parent element has no more content.
trans-unit.target: 开始标记是必需的。如果此元素后紧跟另一个 <option> 元素或 <optgroup> ，或者如果父元素没有更多内容，则end标记是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The start tag is mandatory. The end tag may be omitted if the <thead> element is immediately followed by a <tbody> or <tfoot> element.
trans-unit.target: 开始标记是必需的。如果 <thead> 元素后紧跟 <tbody> 或 <tfoot> 元素，则可以省略end标签。

trans-unit.source: The start tag is mandatory. The end tag may be omitted if there is no more content in the parent <table> element.
trans-unit.target: 开始标记是必需的。如果父 <table> 元素中没有更多内容，则可以省略end标记。

trans-unit.source: The start tag is required. The end tag may be omitted if the <dd> element is immediately followed by another <dd> element, or if there is no more content in the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 开始标记是必需的。如果 <dd> 元素后紧跟另一个 <dd> 元素，或者如果父元素中没有更多内容，则可以省略end标记。

trans-unit.source: The start tag is required. The end tag may be omitted if the <p> element is immediately followed by an <address>, <article>, <aside>, <blockquote>, <div>, <dl>, <fieldset>, <footer>, <form>, <h1>, <h2>, <h3>, <h4>, <h5>, <h6>, <header>, <hr>, <menu>, <nav>, <ol>, <pre>, <section>, <table>, <ul> or another <p> element, or if there is no more content in the parent element and the parent element is not an <a> element.
trans-unit.target: 开始标记是必需的。如果 <p> 元素后紧跟 <address> ， <article> ， <aside> ， <blockquote> ， <div> ， <dl> ， <fieldset> ， <footer> 和 <form> ， <h1> ， <h2> ， <h3> ， <h4> ， <h5> ， <h6> ， <header> ， <hr> ， <menu> ， <nav> ， <ol> ， <pre> ， <section> ， <table> ， <ul> 或另一个 <p> 元素，或者如果父元素中没有更多内容并且父元素不是 <a> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The start tag may be omitted if the first thing inside it is not a space character, comment, <script> element or <style> element. The end tag may be omitted if the body element has contents or has a start tag, and is not immediately followed by a comment.
trans-unit.target: 如果开始标记中的第一件事不是空格字符，注释， <script> 元素或 <style> 元素，则可以省略开始标记。如果主体元素具有内容或具有开始标签，并且没有紧随其后的注释，则可以省略结束标签。

trans-unit.source: The start tag may be omitted if the first thing inside the <html> element is not a comment.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <html> 元素中的第一件事不是注释，则可以省略start标记。

trans-unit.source: The start tag may be omitted if the first thing inside the head element is an element.
trans-unit.target: 如果头部元素里面的第一个东西是一个元素,那么开始标签可以省略。

trans-unit.source: The start tag may be omitted, if it has a <col> element as its first child and if it is not preceded by a <colgroup> whose end tag has been omitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果开始标签的第一个子元素为 <col> 且开始 <colgroup> 之前没有结束标签的<colgroup>，则可以省略开始标签。

trans-unit.source: The status of the event. This can be one of tentative, confirmed, cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 事件的状态。这可以是 tentative ， confirmed 或 cancelled 。

trans-unit.target: 街道地址。该值是undefined或非空数组，其中每个元素都是string。

trans-unit.target: 严格的HTML和XHTML规范不支持这个元素。

trans-unit.target: 该字符串的前缀为 C:\fakepath\ ，以防止恶意软件猜测用户的文件结构。

trans-unit.source: The string audio/* meaning "any audio file".

trans-unit.source: The string to use as the value of the checkbox when submitting the form, if the checkbox is currently toggled on

trans-unit.source: The styling of the rules is browser-dependant and cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 规则的样式取决于浏览器,不能修改。

trans-unit.source: The subsequent <dd> (Description Details) element provides the definition or other related text associated with the term specified using <dt>.

trans-unit.target: URL的语法非常复杂。它由WHATWG的URL生活标准定义，并在我们的文章“ URL是什么？”中为新手介绍。

trans-unit.source: The telephone number, specified using the tel datatype.
trans-unit.target: 使用 tel 数据类型指定的电话号码。

trans-unit.source: The term "offline(-enabled) applications" sometimes refers specifically to applications that the user has allowed to use offline capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 术语 "离线(-enabled)应用程序 "有时特指用户允许使用离线功能的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The term being defined is identified following these rules:
trans-unit.target: 所定义的术语是按照这些规则确定的。

trans-unit.source: The terms non-proportional, monotype, and monospace are used interchangeably and have the same general meaning: they describe a typeface whose characters are all the same number of pixels wide.

trans-unit.source: The unique, global identifier of an item.

trans-unit.source: The upper numeric bound of the low end of the measured range. This must be greater than the minimum value (min attribute), and it also must be less than the high value and maximum value (high attribute and max attribute, respectively), if any are specified. If unspecified, or if less than the minimum value, the low value is equal to the minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 测量范围下限的上限。如果指定，则必须大于最小值（ min 属性），也必须小于最大值和最大值（分别为 high 属性和 max 属性）。如果未指定，或者小于最小值，则 low 限值等于最小值。

trans-unit.target: 测量范围的上限数字。如果指定，则必须大于最小值（ min 属性）。如果未指定，则最大值为1。

trans-unit.source: The usage of an anchor tag within the page, e.g. <a href="#anchor">anchor</a> is resolved by using the base url as reference and triggers an http request to the base url.
trans-unit.target: 页面中锚标记（例如 <a href="#anchor">anchor</a> ）的用法是通过使用基本url作为参考来解决的，并触发对基本url的http请求。

trans-unit.source: The use of an application cache modifies the normal process of loading a document:
